actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for resolution of land title questions and assure protection of significant historic properties within Silver City, Idaho.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire all mineral interests of claimants to specified lands in and around the Historic District of Silver City, Idaho.

titles.title: A bill to provide for resolution of land title questions and assure protection of significant historic properties within Silver City, Idaho.
